comments.author: Ok-Cockroach-7257
comments.body: 25m Always looking for friends who like the outdoors and cats, I just got a new townhouse, and I know I'm going to go crazy living alone. So I'd like to meet some new friends, I run a surplus store and love antiques. I have 2 cats I rescued who are the sweetest, I'm 2 years sober. Love me some insomniacs like myself, also would love an Italian food lover because I want to take someone to Italian

comments.author: but_heres_the_meower
comments.body:
25f, looking for female friends! I want an accountability buddy for personal goals(study, career, health, etc) who I can also just hang out with. Like if u want body double for studying, practicing art skills, so on and so forth, I'm right here!!!

I'm currently:
- preparing to change career
- studying for CompTIA Network+ certification 
- trying to find ways to get back into art: drawing, painting, just tried terra cotta sculpting last weekend, interested in making collage, etc. I use both digital and traditional mediums, but would like to rely less on digital and exlore more traditional mediums. I'm a burnt out ex art student.
- ESL speaker
- not an avid gamer but currently hooked on stardew valley for like 3rd time & also trying start playing Minecraft 
- I LOVE CATS!!!!!!!
- I'm a lesbian, married since last August ðŸ’–
- my top 3 artists on spotify wrapped this year was Haifa Wehbe, Sir Mix-a-lot, and Zemfira

I moved from another state to a small town near auburn, then to bham, so I'm itching to find new people here  Let's meet, chat & grow together!!

Iâ€™ve also been trying to get back into roller skating and yoga, those are always better with a friend! Additionally, I currently work with kids with autism which keeps me busy during the week, but Iâ€™d love to meet new people in the evenings/weekends and find some chill, like-minded people!

comments.body: 28m looking for some male friends! Iâ€™ll save the long story, but I stepped out of religion and trying to find a community outside of the church.
